title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Elementary theory of Probability; random variables; statistical moments; random processes; convergence of random variables and processes; PSD functions; stochastic differentiations and integrations; the Wiener process and concept of white noise; SDOF linear systems under random inputs (time-domain and frequency domain approaches): MDOF linear systems; introduction to Ito Calculus; derivations of moment functions for a given linear dynamical system; Non-linear problems; the first passage probability
